author: dreiss
msg: cpp: Fix an OpenBSD compilation error that appears to be a real bug
The (Linux) man page for ctime_r states pretty clearly that
the buffer it uses must have space for at least 26 characters.

msg: merge from trunk rev 776620 and 776630 fix display error 'commevents on a certain party'

author: hansbak
msg: correct button error in commevent display in myportal

author: kkolinko
msg: Build files: Apply explicit encoding to all operations that perform filtering.
Those are: 1) <copy>, when filtering is used (has filtering="true" or has a nested <filterset>), 2) <fixcrlf>
